eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons

Class NeighbourhoodManagerConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.bavenir.ogwapi.commons.NeighbourhoodManagerConnector

  • public class NeighbourhoodManagerConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for communication with the Neighbourhood Manager. The methods and fields are mostly static in nature, as this object is supposed to be shared among the ConnectionDescriptors to save resources. All methods are thread safe.
    Author:
    sulfo

      • SERVER_PROTOCOL

        private static final java.lang.String SERVER_PROTOCOL
        Server URL/IP with port and API name. The final end point is then obtained by doing: SERVER_URL + SOME_SERVICE_1 + someAttributeLikeID + SOME_SERVICE_2 + someOtherAttribute + etc... Example for discovery service: SERVER_PROTOCOL + SERVER + DISCOVERY_SERVICE_1 + agid + DISCOVERY_SERVICE_2
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentObjects

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation getAgentObjects(java.lang.String agid)
        Retrieves the list of IoT objects registered under given Agent from the Neighbourhood Manager.
        Parameters:
        agid - The ID of the Agent in question.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under specified agent.

      • storeObjects

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation storeObjects(org.restlet.representation.Representation json)
        Register the IoT object(s) of the underlying eco system e.g. devices, VA service.
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be registered (from request).
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered the Agent by this call.

      • heavyweightUpdate

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation heavyweightUpdate(org.restlet.representation.Representation json)
        Update the thing descriptions of objects registered under the Agent. This will delete the old records and replace them with new ones.
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be updated (from request).
        Returns:
        The list of approved devices to be registered in agent configuration. Approved devices means only devices, that passed the validation in semantic repository and their instances were created.

      • lightweightUpdate

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation lightweightUpdate(org.restlet.representation.Representation json)
        Update the thing descriptions of objects registered under the Agent. This will only change the required fields.
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be updated (from request).
        Returns:
        The list of approved devices to be registered in agent configuration. Approved devices means only devices, that passed the validation in semantic repository and their instances were created.

      • deleteObjects

        public org.restlet.representation.Representation deleteObjects(org.restlet.representation.Representation json)
        Deletes - unregisters the IoT object(s).
        Parameters:
        json - Representation of the incoming JSON. List of IoT thing descriptions that are to be removed (taken from request).
        Returns:
        Notification of success or failure.
